pages.privacy-policy: Cat Haven Realty: Your Privacy Matters to Us +91-906-6571111 cathavenrealty@gmail.com Cat Haven Realty Home About Us Houses Trust us What are they saying about us Join The numbers about us Dream House Write to us Cat Haven Realty: Privacy Policy Welcome to Cat Haven Realty, the premier real estate agency dedicated to helping cat lovers find their purr-fect homes. As a leading authority in the feline-friendly housing market, we understand the importance of being transparent with our clients. This disclaimer aims to provide you with a clear understanding of our services, policies, and practices. At Cat Haven Realty, we strive to offer accurate and up-to-date information on our website and marketing materials. However, we cannot guarantee the absolute accuracy, completeness, or reliability of the information provided. The real estate market is dynamic, and changes may occur rapidly, affecting the availability, pricing, and details of properties listed. Our website and marketing materials may contain links to third-party websites or resources. While we aim to provide reputable sources, we cannot be held responsible for the content, accuracy, or practices of these external sites. We encourage our clients to exercise caution and prudence when accessing such third-party resources. Cat Haven Realty is not a party to any real estate transactions conducted through our platform. We act as a facilitator, connecting potential buyers and sellers with each other and providing relevant information to assist in the decision-making process. However, all negotiations, contractual agreements, and legal obligations lie solely between the respective parties involved in the transaction. It is essential to note that the information provided by Cat Haven Realty should not be considered legal, tax, or financial advice. We strongly recommend consulting with qualified professionals in their respective fields before making any significant decisions related to real estate transactions. While we take reasonable measures to ensure the safety and security of our website and systems, we cannot guarantee absolute protection against unauthorized access, viruses, or other malicious activities. We advise our clients to take appropriate precautions and employ industry-standard security measures to safeguard their personal information and devices. Cat Haven Realty reserves the right to modify, update, or discontinue any aspect of our services, website, or policies at any time and without prior notice. We may also impose limitations or restrictions on certain features or functionalities as deemed necessary. It is important to understand that the properties listed on our website and presented by our agents are subject to availability and may change without notice. We make every effort to keep our listings current, but we cannot guarantee that the information provided is up-to-date or accurate at all times. We encourage you to verify any crucial details directly with our agents or the respective property owners/sellers. Furthermore, Cat Haven Realty does not endorse or recommend any specific properties, services, or products featured on our website or through our marketing channels. We aim to provide a comprehensive platform for buyers and sellers to connect, but the ultimate decision lies with our clients. We advise our clients to conduct thorough research, due diligence, and seek professional guidance when necessary. Cat Haven Realty holds no responsibility for any losses, damages, or inconveniences that may arise from the use of our website, services, or the reliance on the information provided. Our role is to facilitate the real estate process, but we cannot control or guarantee the actions, behaviors, or representations of third parties involved in any transactions. By utilizing our services, you acknowledge and agree that Cat Haven Realty, its affiliates, employees, agents, and representatives shall not be held liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, consequential, or punitive damages, regardless of the cause or nature of such damages. We value the trust our clients place in us, and we strive to maintain the highest standards of professionalism and integrity. However, we cannot be held responsible for any disputes, misunderstandings, or legal issues that may arise between buyers, sellers, or other parties involved in real estate transactions facilitated through our platform. In the realm of real estate, visual representations such as photographs, virtual tours, and video walkthroughs play a crucial role in showcasing properties. At Cat Haven Realty, we strive to provide accurate and up-to-date visual materials to our clients. However, it is important to note that these visuals are intended for illustrative purposes only and may not reflect the current condition or appearance of the property. Furthermore, the visual materials provided by Cat Haven Realty are subject to the artistic interpretation and stylistic choices of the photographers, videographers, or virtual tour providers. These visuals may be enhanced, edited, or digitally altered to improve their quality or highlight specific features of the property. As such, the visual representations should not be considered as an absolute representation of the property's condition or an implied warranty. We strongly advise our clients to schedule physical viewings or inspections of any properties they are interested in, as this will provide the most accurate and up-to-date assessment of the property's condition, features, and surroundings. Relying solely on visual materials without conducting proper due diligence may lead to misunderstandings or unrealistic expectations. It is essential to understand that the real estate market is constantly evolving, and properties may undergo changes, renovations, or alterations over time. As such, the visual materials provided by Cat Haven Realty may not reflect the most recent updates or modifications to a property. Additionally, we cannot guarantee the accuracy or completeness of any information provided by third-party sources, such as property descriptions, neighborhood profiles, or community amenities. While we strive to verify and cross-reference such information, we encourage our clients to conduct their own research and consult with relevant authorities or professionals to ensure the accuracy of any critical information. At Cat Haven Realty, we prioritize transparency and strive to provide our clients with the best possible service. However, we cannot be held responsible for any discrepancies, inaccuracies, or misrepresentations that may arise from the visual materials or third-party information provided. We strongly encourage our clients to exercise due diligence, seek professional advice when necessary, and make informed decisions based on their own research and findings. At Cat Haven Realty, we understand the significance of community in the real estate industry. Our website and marketing materials may feature information about local neighborhoods, amenities, schools, and community events. However, it is crucial to note that this information is provided for general informational purposes only and should not be considered as definitive or legally binding. While we make every effort to ensure the accuracy and timeliness of the community information presented, we cannot guarantee its absolute precision or completeness. Community dynamics, statistics, and offerings are subject to change over time, and it is essential to verify any critical details directly with the relevant authorities or service providers. Additionally, any opinions, reviews, or ratings provided by third parties or community members regarding specific neighborhoods, amenities, or services should be evaluated with caution. Cat Haven Realty does not endorse or validate the accuracy or truthfulness of such subjective assessments, as they may reflect personal biases, experiences, or perspectives. It is important to note that Cat Haven Realty does not have direct control over the operations, maintenance, or management of any community facilities, services, or events mentioned on our website or marketing materials. We provide this information as a courtesy to our clients, but we cannot be held responsible for any changes, disruptions, or issues that may arise within these community offerings. Furthermore, we advise our clients to conduct their own research and due diligence when evaluating the suitability of a particular community or neighborhood for their specific needs and preferences. Factors such as personal lifestyle, commuting requirements, accessibility, and individual priorities should be carefully considered before making any final decisions. If you have any concerns or inquiries regarding our ethical standards, industry compliance, or the conduct of any parties involved in transactions facilitated through our platform, please do not hesitate to contact us at cathavenrealty@gmail.com. Our dedicated team will be happy to address your concerns and provide guidance to the best of our knowledge and capabilities. Please read these Terms of Use carefully before using our services. Acceptance of Terms By accessing or using our website, you signify your agreement to these Terms of Use and our Privacy Policy. You may not use our website for any illegal or unauthorized purpose. You must not attempt to interfere with or compromise the integrity of our website or any connected network. 3.Intellectual Property All content on our website, including but not limited to text, graphics, logos, images, and software, is the property of Cat Haven Realty or its respective owners and is protected by intellectual property laws. You may not copy, reproduce, distribute, modify, or create derivative works from our content without our prior written consent. 4.Third-Party Links Our website may contain links to third-party websites or resources. We do not control or endorse these external sites, and we are not responsible for their content, privacy policies, or practices. Use of such third-party websites is at your own risk. 5.User Conduct You agree to use our website in a responsible and lawful manner. You must not: Engage in any unlawful, harmful, or harassing behavior Impersonate any person or entity or misrepresent your affiliation Introduce any viruses, worms, Trojan horses, or other malicious code Attempt to gain unauthorized access to our website or systems Interfere with or disrupt our website or services 6.Disclaimer of Warranties Our website is provided "as is" without any express or implied warranties. We do not guarantee the accuracy, completeness, or reliability of the information on our website. Your use of our website is at your own risk. 7.Limitation of Liability In no event shall Cat Haven Realty or its affiliates be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising out of or in connection with the use of our website or any information provided on our website. 8.Indemnification You agree to indemnify, defend, and hold Cat Haven Realty and its affiliates harmless from and against any claims, liabilities, damages, losses, and expenses, including reasonable attorneys' fees, arising out of or in connection with your use of our website or violation of these Terms of Use. 9.Termination We reserve the right to terminate or suspend your access to our website at any time and for any reason, without prior notice or liability. 10.Governing Law These Terms of Use shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the jurisdiction in which Cat Haven Realty is headquartered. 11.Modifications We reserve the right to modify or update these Terms of Use at any time without prior notice. Your continued use of our website after any such modifications constitutes your acceptance of the updated Terms of Use. 12.Entire Agreement These Terms of Use, together with our Privacy Policy, constitute the entire agreement between you and Cat Haven Realty regarding your use of our website and supersede all prior or contemporaneous communications and proposals, whether oral or written. 13.Severability If any provision of these Terms of Use is found to be invalid, unlawful, void or unenforceable, that provision shall be severed from the remaining terms and conditions, which shall continue to be valid and enforceable. 14.No Waiver Failure by Cat Haven Realty to enforce any provision of these Terms of Use shall not be construed as a waiver of any provision or right. 15.Headings The headings used in these Terms of Use are for convenience only and shall not be used to interpret or construe their provisions. 16.Copyright Notices All content and materials on our website, including but not limited to text, graphics, logos, button icons, images, audio clips, and software, are protected by copyright laws and are the property of Cat Haven Realty or its respective owners. The unauthorized use, reproduction, or distribution of any copyrighted materials is strictly prohibited. 17.Trademarks All trademarks, service marks, and trade names displayed on our website are proprietary to Cat Haven Realty or their respective owners. Nothing contained on our website shall be construed as granting, by implication, estoppel, or otherwise, any license or right to use any trademark displayed on our website without the written permission of Cat Haven Realty or the respective trademark owner. 18.User Submissions By submitting any content, materials, or information to our website, you grant Cat Haven Realty a perpetual, irrevocable, worldwide, non-exclusive, royalty-free license to use, reproduce, display, modify, adapt, publish, translate, distribute, and create derivative works from such content, materials, or information. 19.Feedback and Suggestions Any feedback, comments, suggestions, or ideas submitted to Cat Haven Realty regarding our website or services ("Feedback") shall be deemed non-confidential and non-proprietary. Cat Haven Realty shall have the right to use, reproduce, disclose, and distribute such Feedback without limitation or compensation. 20.Digital Millennium Copyright Act Cat Haven Realty respects the intellectual property rights of others. If you believe that your copyrighted work has been copied and is accessible on our website in a way that constitutes copyright infringement, please follow the procedures outlined in our Digital Millennium Copyright Act (DMCA) Notice and Takedown Policy. 21.Compliance with Laws You agree to comply with all applicable laws, statutes, ordinances, and regulations regarding your use of our website and any transactions or activities conducted through our website. 22.Changes to the Website Cat Haven Realty reserves the right to modify, update, or discontinue any part of our website, including content, features, and functionality, at any time without prior notice or liability to you or any third party. 23.Availability and Accessibility While we strive to provide uninterrupted access to our website, we cannot guarantee that our website will always be available or error-free. We may need to conduct maintenance, repairs, or updates from time to time, which may cause temporary disruptions or outages. 24.Third-Party Services Our website may integrate or link to third-party services, websites, or applications. We do not control or endorse these external services, and we are not responsible for their content, privacy policies, or practices. Use of such third-party services is at your own risk. 25.Disclaimers Cat Haven Realty does not guarantee the accuracy, completeness, or reliability of any information, content, or materials displayed on our website. We disclaim all warranties, express or implied, including but not limited to the implied warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, and non-infringement. 26.Limitation of Liability In no event shall Cat Haven Realty or its affiliates be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising out of or in connection with the use or inability to use our website or any content, materials, or services available on our website, even if we have been advised of the possibility of such damages. 27.Dispute Resolution In the event of any dispute or claim arising out of or in connection with these Terms of Use or your use of our website, you agree to attempt to resolve such dispute or claim through good faith negotiations with Cat Haven Realty. If the parties are unable to reach a resolution through negotiations, the dispute or claim shall be resolved through binding arbitration administered by a reputable arbitration organization in accordance with its rules and procedures. 28.Class Action Waiver To the fullest extent permitted by applicable law, you agree that any and all disputes or claims arising out of or in connection with these Terms of Use or your use of our website shall be arbitrated on an individual basis and not as a class action, consolidated, or representative action. 29.Governing Law and Jurisdiction These Terms of Use shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of [insert relevant jurisdiction], without regard to its conflict of laws principles. Any legal action or proceeding arising out of or in connection with these Terms of Use or your use of our website shall be brought exclusively in the courts located in [insert relevant jurisdiction], and you hereby consent to the personal jurisdiction of such courts. 30.Modifications and Updates Cat Haven Realty reserves the right to modify, update, or amend these Terms of Use at any time by posting the updated version on our website. Your continued use of our website after any such modifications constitutes your acceptance of the updated Terms of Use. pages.about: Discover Cat Haven Realty: Your Partner in Feline-Friendly Real Estate +91-906-6571111 cathavenrealty@gmail.com Cat Haven Realty Home About Us Houses Trust us What are they saying about us Join The numbers about us Dream House Write to us About Cat Haven Realty Your Trusted Partner in Feline-Friendly Real Estate Our Mission At Cat Haven Realty, our mission is to help cat lovers find homes that cater to both their needs and the needs of their beloved feline companions. We are dedicated to creating a harmonious living environment for you and your cats. Expertise in Cat-Friendly Living With a deep understanding of what makes a home truly cat-friendly, our team specializes in matching clients with properties that offer the perfect blend of comfort, safety, and feline-approved features. Personalized Service We believe in providing personalized service tailored to each client's unique requirements. From finding the right property to ensuring it meets your cats' needs, we are here to make your home search a delightful experience. Community Engagement Beyond real estate, we are passionate about building a community of cat lovers. Join us for events, tips on cat care, and a shared love for all things feline. Cat Haven Realty is more than just a real estate agency; we are a community of cat enthusiasts. FAQ - About Cat Haven Realty Answers to Your Questions About Us Here are some common questions about Cat Haven Realty and our services. If you have any other inquiries, feel free to reach out to us directly. What makes Cat Haven Realty unique? Cat Haven Realty specializes in finding homes that cater to both cat owners and their feline companions. We understand the importance of creating a harmonious living environment for both. How can I contact Cat Haven Realty? You can reach us by phone at +123-456-7890 or email us at info@cathavenrealty.com. We are also available for in-person consultations at our office. Do you offer virtual tours of properties? Yes, we provide virtual tours of select properties for clients who prefer to view homes remotely. Contact us to schedule a virtual tour. What areas do you serve? Cat Haven Realty operates in the greater metropolitan area, serving cat lovers looking for feline-friendly homes in urban and suburban settings. Are your agents experienced in working with cat owners? Yes, our agents are trained to understand the unique needs of cat owners and are dedicated to finding properties that meet both human and feline requirements. Our Team Meet the Cat Haven Realty Experts At Cat Haven Realty, our team is comprised of passionate professionals who are dedicated to helping you find the perfect home for you and your feline companions. With a deep love for cats and a wealth of experience in real estate, we are here to guide you through every step of the home-buying process. Get to know our team of cat enthusiasts who are committed to making your cat-friendly living dreams a reality. Our Values Guiding Principles at Cat Haven Realty Customer-Centric Approach We prioritize our clients' needs and strive to exceed their expectations by providing personalized service and tailored solutions to ensure satisfaction. Feline Wellbeing Advocates We are dedicated to promoting the wellbeing of cats by advocating for cat-friendly living spaces and ensuring our properties meet high standards of comfort and safety for feline residents. Community Engagement We believe in fostering a sense of community among cat lovers, sharing knowledge, resources, and a passion for creating homes that cater to both humans and their beloved cats. Create a stimulating environment that keeps your furry companions happy and entertained. Find the perfect blend of comfort and convenience for both you and your cats. Expert Cat-Approved Services Trust Our Team to Find Your Purr-fect Home At Cat Haven Realty, our dedicated team of experts understands the unique needs of cat owners. We go above and beyond to match you with properties that not only meet your requirements but also cater to your feline companions' comfort and happiness. Whether you're looking for a peaceful retreat or a playful paradise, we are here to guide you every step of the way. With our specialized knowledge and passion for all things feline, we are committed to making your home search a delightful experience. Let us help you navigate the real estate market with ease and find a home where both you and your cats can thrive. Trust Cat Haven Realty for personalized service tailored to you and your beloved pets.
